Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities  The .Net Developer designs, modifies, develops, writes and implements software programming applications and components; supports and/or installs software applications and components; works from written specifications and pre-established guidelines to perform the functions of the job and maintains documentation of process flow.Essential duties and responsibilitiesUtilize established development tools, guidelines and conventions including but not limited to ASP.NET, SQL Server, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and C#/VB.NETDesign, code and test new Windows and web software applications, Create technical specificationsEnhance existing systems by analyzing business objectives, preparing an action plan, identifying areas for modification and improvementWrite API and web services and modules to integrate with other applicationsUnderstanding of fundamental design principles for building a scalable applicationProficient understanding & writing of code versioning tools {{such as Git, SVN, and Mercurial}}Project management skill and approach to agile deliveryRequired Candidate profileRequired Candidate profile4-5 years of experience in web developmentExperience in Microsoft technologies (Microsoft Dot Net, C#, ASP.NET, MVC,)Strong knowledge of .NET web framework. Proficient in {{C# and/or VB.NET}}, with a good knowledge of their ecosystemsExperience in popular web application frameworksInvestigate and develop skills in new technologiesLooking for candidates who can join with short notice
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization, Any Graduate in Any Specialization
